meanings: (단단한 물체를) break, (산산조각을 내다) smash, shatter, (금이 가다) crack

vlive.korean: 깬다! - 깬다! Defeat them! - Defeat them! 듣기 View video LEE BYOUNG GON : [DIARY CAM 4] 이병곤 l YG보석함
뒤에 깬다 깬다. You're going to break it. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.88 'JEALOUSY' MV
그러니까 뭔가 우리가 틀을 깬다. So we break the standard... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : GOING GOING SKZ
[패기 넘치는 구호로 일심동체] 깬다! [All become one under the ambitious slogan] Defeat them! 듣기 View video KIM DO YOUNG : [DIARY CAM 4] 김도영 l YG보석함
vlive.english: [All become one under the ambitious slogan] Defeat them!

vlive.korean: 이거 약간 기존의 틀을 깬다. - 이게 안무야? - 네. We break the basic standards... - That's a dance move? - Yes. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : GOING GOING SKZ
vlive.english: We break the basic standards... - That's a dance move? - Yes.
